Ramos''' bụ onye Naijiria na-ede abụ, onye edemede, onye nyocha na onye bụ ọka iwu.
Nwaafọ Lagos, amụrụ na aịlandị Legos  ma too na Menlandị Lagos
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Ladi-Lak institute, Alagomeji, Yaba, Lagos Naigeria
Ọ gara koleji Lagos City , Sabo, Yaba, Lagos (nke bụzi koleji seniọ nke Lagos City) ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị.

Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu site na arụmorụ. Ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Law (LL.B) na Master of Laws (LL.M) nzere na Mahadum Lagos, Naijiria. E gosipụtara abụ ya na mba na mba ụwa, akwụkwọ akụkọ na ịntanetị. E bipụtara abụ ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche na UK site na Forward Poetry na 2005, 2006, 2008 na 2011; site na Poetry Institute of South Africa na Venturing Vista na 2007 na site na Bulkybon Publication, Naijiria na 2016.

N'afọ 2006, edepụtara abụ ya ma bipụta ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ" ŌCamouflage: Best Contemporary Writings In Nigeria". E bipụtara abụ ya ama ama nke akpọrọ" ŌLao n'afọ 2011 na akwụkwọ akụkọ Nation , n'otu afọ ahụ, o gosipụtara n'ịntanetị dị ka otu n'ime mmadụ narị asaa na iri anọ na abụọ bụ ndị ode abụ nke United Nations Peace

Abụ ya nke akpọrọ "Another Verse for Bola", abụ ịhụnanya (ụbọchị ọmụmụ) nke e dere na 2010 ka edepụtara dị ka otu n'ime abụ ịhụnanya kachasị mma ma bipụta ya site na Forward Poetry UK. N'afọ 2016, Ramos dere abụ a ma ama maka uri Prọfesọ Niyi Osundare nke na-akọwa ndị ọka ikpe na ọrụ iwu nke Naijiria nke akpọrọ "Onyenwe m, ebe m kwesịrị idebe ụtụ isi gị"
A na-akpọ nzaghachi Ramos "Judicial Response" ma ọ bụ Right of Reply", ma Premium Times bipụtara ya.
